titles.title: SCRUB Act of 2023
SCRUB Act of 2023
Searching for and Cutting Regulations that are Unnecessarily Burdensome Act of 2023
To provide for the establishment of a process for the review of rules and sets of rules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
